document_data.name: ''Nature's Embrace''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Nature's Embrace''''' was an enchanted [[druid]]ic [[robe]], encountered in [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: It was believed that the ''Nature's Embrace'' was ''[[bless]]ed'' by nature itself, granting the wearer ''[[cat's grace]]'' and armor of a [[turtle]], similar to that of a ''+4'' enchantment.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Qawasha]]: a [[druid]] of the [[Emerald Enclave]] from [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
